13.fullDescription:
The function `sudicideAnyone()` executes the SUICIDE instruction. The remaining Ether is sent to the caller's address.

It seems that this function can be called without restrictions.
13.name: AccessControlVulnerability

12.fullDescription: SimpleSuicide.sudicideAnyone (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/simple_suicide.sol#12-14) allows anyone to destruct the contract
12.name: AccessControlVulnerability

fullDescription.text:
The function `sudicideAnyone()` executes the SUICIDE instruction. The remaining Ether is sent to the caller's address.

It seems that this function can be called without restrictions.
SimpleSuicide.sudicideAnyone (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/simple_suicide.sol#12-14) allows anyone to destruct the contract
